idea-plugin.name: CodeTemplate
idea-plugin.description:
用于快速添加或保存代码块，使其在云端同步，以减少重复的配置，提高编码幸福感 适用于需要经常新建工程的程序员
Used to quickly add or save blocks of code to synchronize them in the cloud to reduce repetitive configuration and increase coding happiness Suitable for programmers who need to build new projects frequently
